nodes.id: 中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会
中共云南省委纪律检查委员会
中共云南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在云南省的省级纪律检查机关，行政级别为副省级，与云南省监察委员会合署办公。1950年4月由中共云南省委决定成立，1955年8月被中共云南省委监察委员会取代。文化大革命后于1978年9月重新成立，1983年改称现名。
description.en: The provincial-level discipline inspection agency of the Communist Party of China in Yunnan Province, with a sub-provincial administrative level. It works jointly with the Yunnan Provincial Supervisory Commission. It was established in April 1950 by the decision of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Committee and was replaced by the CCP Yunnan Provincial Supervisory Committee in August 1955. After the Cultural Revolution, it was re-established in September 1978 and renamed to its current name in 1983.

description.zh-cn: 云南省地方国家监察机关，与中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会合署办公。
description.en: The local state supervisory organ of Yunnan Province, which works jointly with the CCP Yunnan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as the Secretary of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会副书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as a Deputy Secretary of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会副书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as a Deputy Secretary of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会副书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as a Deputy Secretary of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会副书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician, serving as a Deputy Secretary of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal control institution of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党云南省代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党云南省代表大会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在云南省的最高权力机关。
description.en: The highest authority of the Communist Party of China in Yunnan Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在云南省的领导机关。
description.en: The leadership organ of the Communist Party of China in Yunnan Province.

nodes.id: 中共云南省委监察委员会

zh-cn: 中共云南省委监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 1955年至文化大革命期间存在的中共云南省委纪律检查机构，在文革期间工作瘫痪。
description.en: The discipline inspection body of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Committee that existed from 1955 until the Cultural Revolution, during which its functions were paralyzed.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间在中华人民共和国发生的一场重大政治运动。
description.en: A major political movement in the People's Republic of China from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共云南省委纪律检查委员会第一书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the First Secretary of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共云南省委纪律检查委员会常务书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Standing Secretary of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

relationships.source: 中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会是中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会的下级机构。
description.en: The CCP Yunnan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection is a subordinate body of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.

relationships.source: 中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党云南省代表大会

description.zh-cn: 根据《中国共产党章程》，省级纪律检查委员会受同级党的代表大会领导。
description.en: According to the Constitution of the Communist Party of China, provincial commissions for discipline inspection are led by the party congress at the same level.

relationships.source: 中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会
relationships.target: 云南省监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会与云南省监察委员会合署办公，是“一套人马、两块牌子”的机构。
description.en: The CCP Yunnan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection and the Yunnan Provincial Supervisory Commission work jointly in the same office, operating under the model of 'one team, two signs'.

relationships.target: 中国共产党云南省纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 1950年4月，中共云南省委决定成立中共云南省委纪律检查委员会。
description.en: In April 1950, the CCP Yunnan Provincial Committee decided to establish the CCP Yunnan Provincial Commission for Discipline Inspection.

relationships.target: 中共云南省委监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 1955年8月30日，中共云南省委成立了中共云南省委监察委员会。
description.en: On August 30, 1955, the CCP Yunnan Provincial Committee established the CCP Yunnan Provincial Supervisory Committee.

relationships.target: 中共云南省委监察委员会

description.zh-cn: 在文化大革命期间，中共云南省委监察委员会的工作陷入瘫痪。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, the work of the CCP Yunnan Provincial Supervisory Committee was paralyzed.
